reviewText: This is a movie where you can actually think " gee, my soul-mate might just be out there somewhere!" It was mysterious, thrilling and kept you guessing.

reviewText: This is another favorite I had in my collection and lost it.  I loved this movie. The action, suspense, drama all these things made this movie a keeper for me.
Title: Rendezvous

reviewText: I love Gary Dourdan, but this movie rendition of the book was terrible.  Bad acting, bad editing, just BAD.  Do not even bother buying this, renting, or wasting your time watching this because you will be SORRY.  Like I was.
Title: Rendezvous

reviewText: Although Gary Dourdan looked fantabulous in this movie, I thought it was one of the worst movies ever done by Roy Campanella II.  First of all, the love scenes came too quickly, it didn't even make sense.  Second of all, how dumb could that girl get.  First she didn't know who those people were chasing her than she knew who the people were.  It was like Lady, make up your mind.  This was just as bad as that movie "Ritual".  This is a waste. Do not buy it please
summary: Another movie that I should've left in Wal-Mart
Title: Rendezvous

reviewText: I really enjoyed this film. I watched it several times. I liked the chemistry/energy between the two lead characters. The classic "hero-saves-damsel- in-distress" film but with an Afrocentric flavor. Wendy Davis has an unusual brand of beauty. The more you see her, the better she looks. Tricky plot, plenty of "edge-of-your-seat" drama/action. A good one to add to your collection.
Title: Rendezvous
